title: Global Skywatch Interviews
cleaned_text:
Below is a list of many/most Global Skywatch interviews that have occurred since the beginning of our organization. Some interviewers did not archive their interviews, so they may be missing.

When you truly understand how the world works, then you are equipped to make smart decisions and to properly prepare for the future. We truly hope this information changes your life and the way you think about the world.

• The power you have: Will you use it?

This rapid-fire 2-hour interview is packed with information about chemtrails, world politics, and heartfelt inspiration.

First we talk about defending our health against the chemtrail assault on our bodies.

Second, we talk about how the world really works in the big picture.

Finally, we open up about vulnerability, overcoming our fears, being effective in our lives and our relationships, and how changing ourselves changes our world.

What really happened at the Paris Climate Conference? Was it actually about climate, or was that a cover for a deeper real agenda? On the surface, it was promoted as a gathering of world leaders out of genuine concern for the future of our planet, focused on the issue of the threat to all life on Earth posed by "climate change." Yet what really is climate change? Even a little study shows us that climate has been changing since the Earth was first created, and it still is today. The United Nations is warning that the climate is getting steadily warmer, and this could cause ultimate catastrophe. Many scientists believe this, and others believe the climate is getting cooler. Both sides present their data. Either one could destroy the biosphere, with us in it.

Lost Arts Radio welcomes back our friend Russ Tanner (http://www.globalskywatch.com), one of the hosts on "GeoengineeringWatch Radio", that Richard used to work with on that show. Russ and Richard get to discuss in detail and depth what is really going on with the whole chemtrail issue, all the way from basic details of how the spray operations work, to what is the motive and plan of those pulling the strings from behind the scenes. This will be a discussion you won’t want to miss, whether you are new to this subject or a veteran activist working to get the spraying stopped.

We who struggle for change are all constantly hearing the same old lines “There are too many Americans asleep to accomplish anything”, or “A majority of Americans are just sheep (sheeple)”.

The truth is just the opposite!

On this special 3 hour episode of TLBTV Eradicating programmed Ignorance, we present a panel of ultra dedicated individuals in the field of fighting this elite caste against many of the above listed weapons being used against humanity. Those who give their all constantly to unite us and push back on what can only be described as the darkest point in modern human history. What you will hear today will shock and awaken many to this monumental lie, and start us on the path of true unity, in numbers that can no longer be ignored, dismissed or silenced. "At This Moment" with Angela Black



Video Description: We talk about all things CHEMTRAILS / AEROSOL SPRAYING / GEOENGINEERING. This, being the GREATEST CRIME AGAINST, and GREATEST THREAT TO HUMANITY and ALL LIFE ON EARTH in HISTORY. Chemtrails, Geoengineering, Solar Radiation Management (SRM)... We talk about Russ' journey, how greatly humans and life forms are damaged by toxic plumes sprayed by aircraft, along with HAARP... Nanoparticulates, including Aluminum, Strontium, Cesium, Barium, Mercury, Toluene, etc. Russ has defined at LEAST thirteen (13) types of aerosol "plumes," based on SMELL, due to his acute sense of taste and smell, which he has had all his life. We talk about the importance of Potassium and Magnesium, and in general, defending yourself against these deadly nanoparticulates in the air we breathe. Russ uses a, "Wet Mask" to protect his lungs and soft tissue from the dangers of breathing in these deadly fumes.

Subjects covered include: Aerosols tastes and types, spray scheduling, hiding spraying from the public, high-bypass turbofans and why they don't make trails, aluminum detox, mercury detox, and more.

In the second hour, Russ Tanner explains the effect mercury and geoengineering has on health and offers ideas to assist detoxing.

MadisonStar Moon interviews Michael Glynn, an airline pilot (allegedly) living in Sydney Australia who claims to be an A330 captain with Qantas.

Michael does not believe in chemtrails and is well known in the debunker community as a non-believer in ongoing global geoengineering programs. Among those debating Michael is Russ Tanner of Global Skywatch.

Russ Tanner from Global Skywatch was interviewed on "The Witching Hour" with Solaris BlueRaven.

In this interview we talked in detail about mercury detox, what we should call chemtrails (chemtrails or geoengineering), how mercury affects people physically and emotionally, how to counteract the health effects of mercury, how media lies to the public, and much more.

"The Doctor Is In"
